competitive_advantages: Complete workflow coverage for key personas

platform_scalability.persona_modularity: High - Each persona is independently scalable
platform_scalability.component_reusability: 85% - Shared component library with persona-specific extensions
platform_scalability.integration_flexibility: High - API-first architecture with standardized integration patterns

performance_characteristics.calculator_performance: Sub-second computation for all standard calculations
